pageProps.title: Search improvements
pageProps.content:
This week brings a number of improvements to search results in the app and
Slack integration.

You can now use `"phrase search"` to find documents that contain an exact phrase,
`-negative` keywords to exclude results, and partial matching with the `*wildcard`
operators.
